balance.title: ACCOUNTS

error.loadingData: An error occured while loading the data.

balance.confirmSeed: Please tap to confirm your 12 seed words

hideAccount: Jy is op die punt om hierdie rekening te verwyder. U kan dit later in die instellings herstel

share.title: Share TronWallet address

QRScanner.title: Address Scanner
QRScanner.explanation: Scan the QRCode to identify the target user
QRScanner.permissionMessage: To scan the public key the app needs your permission to access the camera.

vote.moreVotes: If you need more votes you can Freeze more TRX.
vote.freezeOrLower: You do not have enough frozen TRX. Freeze more TRX or lower the vote amount
vote.freezeToContinue: You do not have enough frozen TRX. Freeze more TRX to continue

 and contacts.

You can manage multiple accounts 
 in your wallet

delete.title: Delete Contact
delete.message: Do you really want to delete this contact?

contacts.empty: Your address book is empty, add a new contact using the button below.
contacts.loadError: There was a problem loading the contacts. Please try again.

form.generalError: There was a problem submitting this form. Please contact an administrator.
form.nameError: The name field must start with a letter, contain a maximum of 32 characters, and it will accept only letters, numbers and white spaces.
form.addressError: Something isn't right with the address. Please double check for typos.
form.uniqueAddressError: The key must be unique. Please choose a different address.
form.uniqueAliasError: Names in your address book must be unique. Please choose a different one.
form.name: NAME

importWallet.title: INVOERWALLET
importWallet.message: As u die privaat sleutel en adres van u beursie het, kan u dit herwin, maar onthou dat TronWallet hoofsaaklik met mnemonics bedryf word. Hierdie herstel metode sal sommige funksies in die App deaktiveer.

unfreeze.title: UNFREEZE
unfreeze.inThreeDays: After a three day period you can unfreeze your TRX
unfreeze.inXMinutes: You can unfreeze your TRX in {{minutes}} minutes.
unfreeze.inXHours: You can unfreeze your TRX in {{hours}} hours.
unfreeze.inXDays: You can unfreeze your TRX in {{days}} days.
unfreeze.now: You can unfreeze your TRX now.

error.minimumAmount: The minimum amount for any freeze transaction is 1.

getVault.notInstalled: It seems that you don't have Tron Vault installed in your phone to proceed with your transaction.

participate.title: NEEM

error.insufficientBalance: Nie genoeg fondse (TRX) om deel te neem nie.

insufficientTrx.title: Jy moet ten minste een TRX-waarde van {{token}}.

participate.warning: Jy het nie genoeg TRX om soveel {{token}}te koop nie

confirm.title: BEVESTIG SEED

error.title: Verkeerde kombinasie
error.message: Geselekteerde woorde stem nie ooreen nie. Maak seker dat jy die woorde in die korrekte volgorde geskryf het.

confirm.explanation: Kies die onderstaande woorde in die regte volgorde om jou geheime frase te bevestig.

create.title: CREATE SEED
create.error: Oops, we have a problem. Please restart the application.
create.generateNew: This will generate a completely new wallet.
create.backupMessage: You can always access your words by accessing the backup on the app settings
create.seedExplanation: The seed key is a human-readable representation of your wallet. Those words, in that exact order, can be used to re-create your wallet.

restore.title: RESTORE WALLET
restore.explanation: To restore your wallet, please provide the same 12 words that you wrote on paper when you created your wallet for the first time. If you enter a different sequence of words, a new empty wallet will be created.
restore.placeholder: Please, type your 12 seed words here
restore.warning: Restore seed will erase all data on this device and pull information from the network for the restored account.
restore.error: Oops. Looks like the words you typed aren't a valid mnemonic seed. Check for a typo and try again.

send.title: SEND

error.incompleteAddress: Address is either incomplete or invalid.

send.minimumAmount: The minimum amount for any send transaction is 0.000001.

modal.title: NETWORK
modal.explanation: With this option you can select the node that will better suit your needs and preferences. Please be careful while updating the node IP while wrong IP can lead to malfunctions within your wallet. Example: 35.231.121.122:50051

error.storage: Error getting node ip from local storage
error.update: Something went wrong while updating nodes ip
error.reset: Something wrong while reseting node ip

success.switchMain: Switched nodes IP to default main

reset.title: Herstel Wallet
reset.warning: Waarskuwing: Hierdie handeling sal alle gestoorde data, insluitend jou 12 geheime woorde, uitvee. As jy nie jou geheime gestoor het nie, doen dit asseblief voordat jy voortgaan.

success.title: Taal verander na {{language}}
success.description: Tog moet jy die program weer begin sodat die veranderinge in werking kan tree. Wil jy dit nou doen?

button.cancel: Nee, ek sal dit later doen

about.title: oor
about.description: TronWallet is 'n open source, volledig gedesentraliseerde P2P Crypto Wallet vir TRON Network gebou met React Native. Daarmee kan jy tokens stuur en ontvang, stem op 'n Superverteenwoordiger, deelneem aan 'n tekenverkoop, hou jou saldo's en transaksies en nog baie meer by. Tik op die skakel hieronder vir 'n gedetailleerde handleiding oor hoe om dit te gebruik.

accounts.title: rekeninge
accounts.noAccounts: Geen rekeninge moet herstel word nie

submitTransaction.title: TRANSAKSIE DETAILS
submitTransaction.disconnectedMessage: Dit blyk dat jy ontkoppel is. Skakel weer aan op die internet voordat u met die transaksie voortgaan.

errorDic.contractValidate: Transaksiedata is nie geldig nie. Probeer asseblief weer later.
errorDic.contractValidateCee: Transaksie data nie geldig nie (CEE). Probeer asseblief weer later.
errorDic.bandwith: Nie genoeg bandwydte nie. Probeer asseblief weer later.
errorDic.contractValidateTapos: Transaksiedata is nie geldig nie (TAPOS). Probeer asseblief weer later.
errorDic.tooBig: Transaksie te groot om ingedien te word.
errorDic.expiration: Transaksie het verstryk. Probeer asseblief weer.
errorDic.resource: Onvoldoende bandwydte of balans. Jy sal dalk gevriesde TRX nodig hê.

clipboard.tronscanUrl: Tronscan url vir hierdie transaksie gekopieer na die knipbord
clipboard.publicKey: Publieke sleutel gekopieer na die knipbord

votes.error: Oeps, iets het nie korrek gelaai nie. Probeer herlaai

error.code: Betalingskode ongeldig. Skandeer asseblief 'n geldige een

error.token: Hierdie rekening het nie die teken vir hierdie transaksie nie
error.amount: Hierdie rekening het nie genoeg balans nie.

error.currency: Ons kon nie ander geldeenheidspryse laai nie. Gebruik asseblief TRX as verwysing
